title: Galaxy S22 pre-orders are crashing Samsungâ€™s online store, preventing orders for some
content:
There’s a fair bit to get excited about with the Galaxy S22 series, including just the fact that prices didn’t go up. However, quite a few people are having trouble submitting pre-orders on Samsung.com for the Galaxy S22, as the site is crashing.

more…

The post Galaxy S22 pre-orders are crashing Samsung’s online store, preventing orders for some appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung's online store is crashing under the pressure of pre-orders for the Galaxy S22, S22 Ultra, and the Galaxy Tab S8 series.
